title: Bills introduced to strengthen U.S. robotics competitiveness, humanoid security
description:
The bills seek to establish a National Commission on Robotics and restrict humanoid imports for U.S. security and competitiveness.

The post Bills introduced to strengthen U.S. robotics competitiveness, humanoid security appeared first on The Robot Report.
